attributes.action: Save Isle of Wight Wind Turbine Jobs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We ask the Government to step in and help the employee's keep their jobs in a sector that should be moving forward rather than laying off staff. As well as the economic ruin that could follow to the island. This plan to close the Vestas Blade UK factories will also have a knock on effect to other businesses on the island and main land.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Isle of Wight Wind Turbine Jobs."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20270


Prime Minister's Office
